Preterit.turoyo: azzémaškele 385; prs 137/20; maškalleʕalḥḏoḏe 386; prs 164/11; azzinomaškeli gab u=rabo, u=raboomərsūmne! ono ṭləbli mine u=šuġl-awo w-hiye lo=maqbele w-aṯyonomaškeliaʕle
translations: ‘I went to complain to the head (of the customs), and he said: “Make (the papers) ready!” EL 33;
‘I demanded “the thing” from him, but he did not agree.
I went and complained about him’ 78/234;

Infectum.turoyo: dušmaškenaʕalḥḏoḏe 395; prs 121/4; prs 225/16; g-əzzehən l-Miḏyaḏ w-g-əzzehən l-Diyārbắkər, g-maškənaʕlan, gd-əṯyo i=ḥkuma, w-latlantaqa d-i=ḥkuma
translations: ‘They are going to go to Midyat and to Diyarbakir and they are going to inform against us, and (then) the government will come, and we have no strength against the government’ 71/18;

Imperativ.turoyo: zəxaškáy s-u=rabo d-at=taʕle 407; prs 195/6; aḥna, u=māl-ano, šqilan b-ak=kallat-ayḏan. d-ubʕətmaškay! 2/79;
